resources.string: A fresh take on Android vs iOS

There is no doubt that Android and iOS are the most popular mobile operating systems out there â€” there are dedicated camps for each and superb devices on either side too. Both of them are constantly evolving, even borrowing features from each other. But from a long-time Android users perspective, what exactly do you stand to gain or lose by switching to iOS?
To find out more, read the comparisions between Android and iOS
